text: Most of those who expound a theory of textual dislocation take it for granted that the Gospel was written entirely by one author before the disturbance took place but a few leave it open to suppose that the original book had been revised even before the upheaval. The ingenuity of the theories is impressive and is the best argument against them nast of those ula expoundl 9 theoy tetual dislocatia tke itfor graucol mat #he Gospel LJas uvHeu eutrely by ^e autlar belmre +e disturbance took place but 0 Rec leave it opeu 40 Suppose +lat te ariginal look had beel revsed eeu before ^le upheaval_ The_ingeuu'ly c the tleries is imptessive aul is {e bexf arqumeut again}l tleu Ihas_8?e]
